quest.name: For the Love of Pudding
journal:
 Quest Sync
The Last Stand employee is having pudding problems.
objectives: Speak with Puddingway and have him accompany you.
Obtain items while Puddingway is accompanying you.
Deliver items to the Last Stand employee while Puddingway is accompanying you.

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: Ah! You're with the Students of Baldesion, aren't you? Please, I need your help!

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: As you may recall, some cute, chatty little rabbits were here with your people the other day.

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: Well, one of them, a fellow named Puddingway, later came asking for─ahem─pudding. Unfortunately, he didn't have the money for it.

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: Instead of paying, the boss suggested having him help around the place. The problem is, he doesn't seem to understand how things work. It must be very different where they come from...

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: Anyway, if you have a moment, do you think could you accompany Puddingway on his errand? It's nothing complicated─just collecting the items on this list. While I can't offer much, there'll be a little something in it for your troubles.

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: If you have a moment, please accompany Puddingway on his errand. It's nothing complicated─just collecting the items on the list I gave you.

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, if it isn't Forename! You've come at the perfect time to lend an ear to my woes!

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ever since Urianger told me about it, it has been my dream to taste the pudding of this star. Alas, that dream has been dashed, my quest for gastronomic pleasure thwarted. And by what? Something silly called “gil”!

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: I had heard about this “gil” before coming here, but who would've thought I'd need it to eat pudding? And so my heart's desire must forever go unfulfilled... <sigh>

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: T-Truly!? I get to eat pudding...and all I need to do is fetch these things with you!?

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: I'll do it! For the love of Hydaelyn, I'll do it! That's a metal mold, some Dellemont fellow's cookbook, and a bottle of yakow milk that we need, yes? Let's hop to it!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Puddingway is now accompanying you. Keep him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave Puddingway behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with him and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have Puddingway accompany you again, return and speak with him at the original location.

dialogue.name: DADAPU
dialogue.text: Did you need something?

dialogue.name: HARLISSAND
dialogue.text: Hm? You got business with me?

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: Oh? Is Puddingway not with you?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be accompanied by Puddingway and have him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have left Puddingway behind. Return to his side to continue the quest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Puddingway has yet to arrive. Be sure he is at your side before attempting to continue.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Talk.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Part ways.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Cancel.

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: You want to review what we need? Then I'll read the list back to you. Let's see here...

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: A metal mold from the Agora, some Dellemont fellow's cookbook from Noumenon...

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: And a bottle of yakow milk from Harlissand at the peristyle. That's everything.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with Puddingway?

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, is there somewhere else you need to be? I suppose I can wait a bit longer for my pudding... I'll be out behind the Last Stand when you're ready.

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ready to continue our errand? Then let's get going!

dialogue.name: DADAPU
dialogue.text: What can I help you and your little bunny friend with?

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: We need a metal mold─something suitable for the making of delicious pudding. Do you have any?

dialogue.name: DADAPU
dialogue.text: I do, as a matter of fact. This is for the Last Stand, I take it? I'll go ahead and put it on your account. Thanks for your custom!

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, I think this is the cookbook we're looking for!

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: The note says it's already checked out for us, so all we need to do is grab it and bring it back!

dialogue.name: HARLISSAND
dialogue.text: From the Last Stand, are you? I heard they'd be sending someone. Here's the yakow milk.

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thank you! I can't wait for it to become delicious pudding!

dialogue.name: HARLISSAND
dialogue.text: Ah, so that's what it's for. The milk's freshly squeezed, so I daresay it'll make a fine treat.

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: How did it go? Were you able to obtain everything?

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: Wonderful! I'll set about making pudding at once!

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: Not just any pudding either, but the famous rainbow pudding, born of the brilliant culinary mind of the legendary Master Dellemont!

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: This little one has wanted to try pudding so badly, it's only right that we serve him the very best.

dialogue.name: CAFESTAFF04316
dialogue.text: As for your good self─this isn't much, but please accept this as payment for your troubles.

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: At long last, the pudding of this star! Mmmmmm, I can already taste it... So much better than Urianger's lackluster offerings...

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thank you ever so much! Because of you, not only do I get to eat pudding─I've learned a thing or two about their making to boot.

dialogue.name: PUDDINGWAY
dialogue.text: As surely as my name is Puddingway, I'll endeavor to learn as much about this toothsome treat as I can!
